title: Safe crawl 7
content:
You thrust your shoulders forward. They stick.
...
You push again. It's just this spot; your hands are free in a wider area ahead. But immovable stone grates against your chest and shoulders.
...
You've got one shoulder past the edge. The other is behind a corner of stone, and you can't imagine how it's going to get through.
...
You brace your legs as best you can, and shove futilely against the trap.

You are never going to leave this place.
